title: Is there any way to reduce packet loss from home?
body: packet loss sucks. i have died many times because i pressed r and nothing happened due to packet loss. So i would like to know if there is any way i could reduce packet loss from home.

replies.body: There are certainly a few steps that can be taken to help tune up your network!  I would start out with running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on, and the results will also provide a list of troubleshoot steps specific to your issue.  In addition to that, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide also provides a series of steps to strengthen your connection.  Hopefully, this will help out with those input delays!
